original_text:
CherryPop
Cherrypop è la giusta sintesi tra tradizione e modernità!
La nuova slot a tema frutta prodotta dalla AvatarUX Studios, Cherrypop, usa una griglia espandibile che offre ben 59.049 modi per vincere!
Tema e grafica
Per i giocatori di vecchia data, le slot fruttate hanno un non so che di romantico, anche se presentano un problema non indifferente: la ripetitività. Per questo ci sentiamo di dover fare un plauso alla AvatarUX Studios che è riuscita a creare una slot con un gameplay originale senza perdere la semplicità tipica delle sue produzioni. Prima di addentrarci nel meccanismo di gioco di Cherrypop, vogliamo spendere due parole anche per il comparto grafico, altro punto di forza dell’azienda cinese. I simboli sono definiti ottimamente, con colori brillanti che aumentano l’appeal della slot. Sulla parte destra troviamo tutti i tasti che ci serviranno per settare al meglio la nostra giocata, il tasto start e quello per avviare i giri automatici. Per quel che riguarda i suoni, si è puntato su un suono monocorde, con il caratteristico pop che si verifica ogni qualvolta uno o più simboli esplodono per lasciare posto agli altri.
Caratteristiche della slot
Si parte con una caratteristica griglia con 5 rulli e 3 linee, ma a seguito delle combinazioni vincenti viene aggiunta una linea superiore in corrispondenza della linea vincente. La griglia si può espandere sino a un massimo di 6 linee superiori in modalità normale e 9 nei Free Spins. Con una puntata minima di 0,20 € e la massima 40 €, Cherrypop si configura come una slot adatta ai novizi ma anche ai giocatori più esperti. I modi per vincere sono 59.049 e si vince se i simboli identici appaiono su rulli adiacenti, al di là della loro posizione. È possibile impostare da 10 giri automatici sino a 1.000, ma è possibile anche non inserire alcun limite e decidere autonomamente quando fermarli.
Simboli e funzionalità
Come detto poco sopra, Cherrypop adotta la modalità PopWins: ogni volta che c’è una combinazione pagante i simboli vincenti esplodono, la griglia cresce di una fila e due nuovi simboli atterrano sui rulli.
Per quel che riguarda le vincite, possiamo suddividere i simboli tra quelli di basso valore, rappresentati dalle carte da gioco dal 9 all’asso, quelli di alto valore come l’uva, l’anguria, l’arancia, il ferro di cavallo, il quadrifoglio, la campana e il diamante, e infine quelli di altissimo valore, le ciliegie racchiuse in una bolla di sapone.
Sbloccando le sei file sui rulli si attivano 5 Free Spins. Prima però vedremo apparire una ruota che mette in palio un numero variabile di Free Spins aggiuntivi sino a un massimo di 12. C’è anche la possibilità di perdere tutto e non giocare per niente nella modalità gratuita. Durante i Free Spins la griglia si può espandere sino a 9 linee, inoltre si parte sempre con un moltiplicatore x2 che aumenta di 1 dopo ogni vincita. Nel caso si riuscisse a sbloccare l’intera griglia, si avrà un immediato +3 al moltiplicatore e successivi +3 per ogni vincita.

raw_translation.response:
CherryPop

CherryPop is the perfect fusion of tradition and modernity!
The new fruit-themed slot produced by AvatarUX Studios, CherryPop, uses an expandable grid that offers a whopping 59,049 ways to win! 

Theme and graphics
For veteran players, fruit-themed slots have a certain romantic appeal, even though they present a significant challenge: repetitiveness. That's why we want to give AvatarUX Studios credit for creating a slot with original gameplay without sacrificing the simplicity that characterizes its productions. Before delving into the mechanics of CherryPop's gameplay, we want to take a moment to appreciate the impressive graphics, another strong point of the Chinese company. The symbols are excellently defined, with bright colors that enhance the slot's appeal. On the right side, we find all the buttons we need to set up our game, including the start button and the auto-spin button. As for sound, a monotonous tone is used, with a characteristic "pop" that occurs whenever one or more symbols explode to make room for others. 

Slot features
We start with a grid with 5 reels and 3 rows, but after winning combinations, an additional row is added at the top of the winning row. The grid can expand up to a maximum of 6 upper rows in regular mode and 9 in Free Spins. With a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €40, CherryPop is suitable for both novice players and experienced gamblers. There are 59,049 ways to win, and winnings occur when identical symbols appear on adjacent rows, regardless of their position. You can set up anywhere between 10 and 1,000 auto-spins, or choose to have no limit and decide when to stop them yourself. 

Symbols and features
As mentioned above, CherryPop uses the PopWins mode: every time there is a winning combination, the winning symbols explode, and the grid expands by one row, with two new symbols landing on the reels.

As for winnings, we can divide symbols into low-value ones, represented by playing cards from nine to ace, high-value ones like grapes, watermelons, oranges, horseshoes, clovers, bells, and diamonds, and finally, the highest value ones: cherries enclosed in a soap bubble.

Unlocking all six rows on the reels triggers 5 Free Spins. Before that, a wheel appears, offering a variable number of additional Free Spins, up to a maximum of 12. There is also the possibility of losing everything and not playing at all in the free mode. During Free Spins, the grid can expand up to 9 rows, and you start with a x2 multiplier, which increases by 1 after each win. If you manage to unlock the entire grid, you get an immediate +3 to the multiplier and subsequent +3 for each win.

As for the sound effects, the mono sound with the characteristic "pop" that occurs when one or more symbols explode to make way for others is a nice touch.

The grid can expand up to a maximum of 6 bonus lines in regular mode and 9 in Free Spins. With a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum bet of €40, CherryPop is suitable for both novice and experienced players. There are 59,049 ways to win, and you win if identical symbols appear on adjacent reels, regardless of their positions. You can choose to play between 10 and 1,000 automatic spins, or not set any limit at all and stop them whenever you want. 

As mentioned earlier, CherryPop uses the PopWins mode: every time there is a winning combination, the winning symbols explode, and the grid grows by one row, and two new symbols land on the reels. 

As for the symbols and features, the low-value symbols are represented by playing cards from 9 to Ace, while high-value symbols include grapes, watermelons, oranges, horseshoes, clovers, bells, and diamonds. The highest value symbol is the cherry encased in a soap bubble.

Unlocking all six rows on the reels activates 5 Free Spins. Before that, a wheel appears with a variable number of Free Spins up to a maximum of 12. During Free Spins, the grid can expand up to nine lines, and you start with a x2 multiplier that increases by 1 after each win. If you manage to unlock the entire grid, you receive an immediate +3 to the multiplier, and subsequent +3 for each win. 

Overall, CherryPop is an exciting slot game that combines classic fruit slot elements with modern gameplay and graphics. It's definitely worth a try!

CherryPop is the perfect fusion of tradition and modernity!
The new fruit-themed slot produced by AvatarUX Studios, CherryPop, uses an expandable grid that offers a whopping 59,049 ways to win! 

Theme and graphics
For veteran players, fruit-themed slots have a certain romantic appeal, even though they present a significant challenge: repetitiveness. That's why we want to give AvatarUX Studios credit for creating a slot with original gameplay without sacrificing the simplicity that characterizes its productions. Before delving into the mechanics of CherryPop's gameplay, we want to take a moment to appreciate the impressive graphics, another strong point of the Chinese company. The symbols are excellently defined, with bright colors that enhance the slot's appeal. On the right side, we find all the buttons we need to set up our game, including the start button and the auto-spin button. As for sound, a monotonous tone is used, with a characteristic "pop" that occurs whenever one or more symbols explode to make room for others. 

Slot features
We start with a grid with 5 reels and 3 rows, but after winning combinations, an additional row is added at the top of the winning row. The grid can expand up to a maximum of 6 upper rows in regular mode and 9 in Free Spins. With a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €40, CherryPop is suitable for both novice players and experienced gamblers. There are 59,049 ways to win, and winnings occur when identical symbols appear on adjacent rows, regardless of their position. You can set up anywhere between 10 and 1,000 auto-spins, or choose to have no limit and decide when to stop them yourself. 

Symbols and features
As mentioned above, CherryPop uses the PopWins mode: every time there is a winning combination, the winning symbols explode, and the grid expands by one row, with two new symbols landing on the reels.

As for winnings, we can divide symbols into low-value ones, represented by playing cards from nine to ace, high-value ones like grapes, watermelons, oranges, horseshoes, clovers, bells, and diamonds, and finally, the highest value ones: cherries enclosed in a soap bubble.

Unlocking all six rows on the reels triggers 5 Free Spins. Before that, a wheel appears, offering a variable number of additional Free Spins, up to a maximum of 12. There is also the possibility of losing everything and not playing at all in the free mode. During Free Spins, the grid can expand up to 9 rows, and you start with a x2 multiplier, which increases by 1 after each win. If you manage to unlock the entire grid, you get an immediate +3 to the multiplier and subsequent +3 for each win.

response.headline: Payouts and Symbols
response.content:
Looking for a slot game with plenty of ways to win? Look no further than CherryPop! With an impressive 59,049 ways to win, this game offers plenty of opportunities to strike it rich. And the best part? You can win just by matching identical symbols on adjacent rows, no matter where they are. Talk about convenience.

As for the symbols themselves, they're a real treat for the eyes. The low-value symbols are represented by playing cards from 9 to Ace, but don't let that fool you - there are plenty of high-value symbols to go around as well. Look out for grapes, watermelons, oranges, horseshoes, clovers, bells, and diamonds, all of which could bring you some major payouts.

But the real showstopper is the cherries. These little guys are enclosed in a soap bubble, making them the most valuable symbol in the game. And if you manage to unlock the entire grid during Free Spins mode, you could see a maximum payout multiplier of up to x41! That's some serious cash just waiting to be won.

All in all, CherryPop is a game that's both visually stunning and incredibly rewarding. So what are you waiting for? Give it a spin and see if you can pop your way to some major winnings!

Review:
 
Gameplay

CherryPop is a fruit-themed online slot with an expandable grid that offers 59,049 ways to win. After winning combinations, an additional row is added to the top of the winning row, and the grid can expand up to a maximum of 6 upper rows in regular mode and 9 in Free Spins. The game has a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €40, making it suitable for both novice players and experienced gamblers. You can also choose to have anywhere between 10 and 1,000 auto-spins, or no limit and decide when to stop them yourself.

Symbols and Payouts

CherryPop uses the PopWins mode, which means that every time there is a winning combination, the winning symbols explode, and the grid expands by one row. The symbols include low-value playing cards from nine to ace, high-value ones like grapes, watermelons, oranges, horseshoes, clovers, bells, and diamonds, and the highest value ones: cherries enclosed in a soap bubble. Winnings occur when identical symbols appear on adjacent rows, regardless of their position. Unlocking all six rows on the reels triggers 5 Free Spins.

PopWins mode

CherryPop's PopWins mode triggers every time there is a winning combination. The winning symbols explode, and the grid expands by one row, with two new symbols landing on the reels.

Free Spins

Unlocking all six rows on the reels triggers 5 Free Spins. Before that, a wheel appears, offering a variable number of additional Free Spins, up to a maximum of 12. There is also the possibility of losing everything and not playing at all in the free mode. During Free Spins, the grid can expand up to 9 rows, and you start with a x2 multiplier, which increases by 1 after each win. If you manage to unlock the entire grid, you get an immediate +3 to the multiplier and subsequent +3 for each win.

Graphics

CherryPop has excellent graphics, with symbols that are brightly colored and defined. The monotonous sound used is a characteristic 'pop' that occurs whenever one or more symbols explodes to make room for others. The buttons we need to set up our game, including the start button and the auto-spin button, are located on the right side of the game screen.
